name: @proof-of-residency/subgraph
description: The subgraph for Proof of Residency.

scripts.create:local: yarn prepare:local && graph create --node http://localhost:8020/ proof-of-residency/mainnet
scripts.deploy:local: yarn prepare:local && yarn create:local && graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5002 proof-of-residency/mainnet
scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn prepare:mainnet && graph deploy --product hosted-service proof-of-residency/mainnet
scripts.deploy:arbitrum-one: yarn prepare:arbitrum-one && graph deploy --product hosted-service proof-of-residency/arbitrum-one
scripts.deploy:optimism: yarn prepare:optimism && graph deploy --product hosted-service proof-of-residency/optimism
scripts.deploy:polygon: yarn prepare:polygon && graph deploy --product hosted-service proof-of-residency/polygon
scripts.deploy:goerli: yarn prepare:goerli && graph deploy --product hosted-service proof-of-residency/goerli
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: yarn prepare:rinkeby && graph deploy --product hosted-service proof-of-residency/rinkeby
scripts.deploy:arbitrum-rinkeby: yarn prepare:arbitrum-rinkeby && graph deploy --product hosted-service proof-of-residency/arbitrum-rinkeby
scripts.deploy:optimism-kovan: yarn prepare:optimism-kovan && graph deploy --product hosted-service proof-of-residency/optimism-kovan
scripts.deploy:polygon-mumbai: yarn prepare:polygon-mumbai && graph deploy --product hosted-service proof-of-residency/polygon-mumbai
